attributes.review: I clearly put a one star review so this app could get deleted and so people who inspire others on TikTok will not have to suffer losing all their work that they put in to inspire people.
attributes.title: 🥵Save TIKTOK 🥵

attributes.review: this app literally threatened to kill my family if i didn’t donate to trumps campaign? kinda annoying. get rid of this app it took a full week to download too, and with so little content. i wanted to learn about trumps campaign but all i got were messages begging for money??? doesn’t seem very noble of our president. bad app very stupid
attributes.title: what is this?

attributes.review: I thought this app would be giving me the latest news on everyone’s fav president, but all I saw was this ugly Cheeto looking thing with a micropenis. How very disappointing.
when i was using the it crashed and me my godzilla girlfriend weren’t happy about that but i might know there’s this orange guy on there maybe that’s why ✋🏻🤨🤚🏻

attributes.review: He thinks that by taking down tik tok it’s going to stop us, it will never stop us. We will stand together against you time and time again.
